summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements over portions of Tracts 2, 3, 4 and 19, Jersey Summer Home Tracts and over portions of Lots 3, 4 and 5, Block 60, H.E. Orr Park, Division No. 5 for sanitary sewer purposes. (Easement North of North 183rd at Meridan - Short Plats 377034 and 1275023; Easement at Northeast 130th Street East of 10th Avenue Northeast - Short Plat 76-65).
